org.zyp.cn8583.parse
类 cnConfigParser

java.lang.Object
  org.zyp.cn8583.parse.cnConfigParser

public class cnConfigParser
extends java.lang.Object

这是一个中国版的8583格式标准的类，初始代码来源于类ConfigParser

This class is used to parse a XML configuration file and configure a MessageFactory with the values from it.

作者：
zyplanke

构造方法摘要
cnConfigParser()
           
 
方法摘要

          已过时。 use createFromXMLConfigFile(String) instead

          Creates a message factory from the file located at the specified URL.

          Creates a message factory from the specified path( full path and filename).
protected static void parse(cnMessageFactory mfact, java.io.InputStream stream)
          Reads the XML from the stream and configures the message factory with its values.

方法详细信息

createDefault

public static cnMessageFactory createDefault()
                                      throws java.io.IOException
已过时。 use createFromXMLConfigFile(String) instead

Creates a message factory configured from the default file, which is j8583.xml located in the root of the classpath.

抛出：
java.io.IOException

createFromXMLConfigFile

public static cnMessageFactory createFromXMLConfigFile(java.lang.String filepath)
                                                throws java.io.IOException
Creates a message factory from the specified path( full path and filename).

抛出：
java.io.IOException

createFromUrl

public static cnMessageFactory createFromUrl(java.net.URL url)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
Creates a message factory from the file located at the specified URL.

抛出：
java.io.IOException

parse

protected static void parse(cnMessageFactory mfact,
                            java.io.InputStream stream)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Reads the XML from the stream and configures the message factory with its values.

参数：
mfact - The message factory to be configured with the values read from the XML.
stream - The InputStream containing the XML configuration.
抛出：
java.io.IOException
